title: Europe must investigate Epstein’s links to Russia
summary_full: If Epstein was in fact a Russian agent, the Kremlin could have the means to blackmail those same people – many of whom may be in even more powerful positions today
summary_public: If Epstein was in fact a Russian agent, the Kremlin could have the means to blackmail those same people – many of whom may be in even more powerful positions today
